title: Hisense A6GE Series 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos  (43A6GE)

product_specification.In The Box: Remote :1U, Manual: 2U, Table Stand: 2U, Wall Mount: 1U, Warranty Card: 1U, Batteries: 2U
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: Dolby Vision, HDR, AVI, MKV, TS, Blu_Ray, DVD_Video, MPEG, WAV, WMA
product_specification.Other Video Features: Dolby Vision HDR, Ultra Vivid High Contrast Panel, HDR10, HLG, Ultra Dimming, UHD AI Upscaler, Game Mode, Precision Colour, Noise Reduction
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Theater, Sports, Music, Speech, Late Night
product_specification.Content Providers: Netflix, YouTube, Google Play Movies and TV, Google Play Store, Prime Video, Disney+ Hotstar
product_specification.Other Internet Features: More Than 5000 Plus Apps and Games, Chromecast, Google Assistant
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Dual Band Wi-Fi, Ethernet LAN In, Digital Audio Out(SPDIF), Bluetooth 5.0 (ver), Headphone/Earphone Jackx1, RF Input, AV In, Browser
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Direct App Access Hotkeys, Bluetooth Voice Remote, Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Brand will contact for free installation. We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. The service engineer will unpack & install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV. For Repair Services, authorized service engineer will do the following: Repair / change the defective part. Provide replacement to the customer in case part / product not repairable (only after replacement request approved). Warranty on replacement product will be applicable upto the warranty date of the replaced/original product.

product_description.Cinematic Experience: Featuring Dolby Vision, the sophisticated HDR that is based on cinema technology, the Hisense A6GE Series LED Smart Android TV lends you a theatre-like experience from the comfort of your home. And, Dolby Vision also renders vivid hues, bright highlights, and pitch blacks, ensuring sharp colour reproduction. This way, it displays true-to-life images to take your viewing experience to another level.
product_description.High-quality Sound: Whether you’re watching a web series, playing games, or enjoying watching live sports, this TV features Dolby Atmos for an engrossing experience. This moving audio is so realistic and immersive that you will feel as though you’re in the midst of all the action.

review: 4 stars only because of sound fluctuations in some occasions... Otherwise its 5/5 product premium picture quality, got it for 26700 in big billion days worth every penny. Hisense will take our feedback to improve the product that's really nice to hear.

Writing this review post 20 days of use:-

honestly its the best available device under this price segment , everything has been working Fine as of Now. Speaker quality is awesome and so loud that even my zebronics sound bar could not match its quality. Picture quality is Fine. 4K videos are working Good without an interruption.
So if you reading this and planning to get a purchase then its the Best.

The tv is good enough at places where there is less sunlight as the brightness is 300 nits but the picture clarity and upscalling is good. Sound quality is enough, but in theater mode the clarity is too good. IF YOU WANT A GREAT SOUND CLARITY AND BETTER BRIGHTNESS TAKE NOKIA TV WHICH IS BETTER OPTION, THIS TV IS MAINLY FOR PEOPLE WHO HAVE A MEDIUM LIVING ROOM WITH LESS SUNLIGHT TOWARDS TV. OVERALL GOOD FOR THE BUDGET , WE DO HAVE BETTER OPTIONS.
Hisense TV is Very Good TV Sound quity is Satisfactory Little Bit Clarity Low Display is Good

Well i must say this is the best tv when compared to any of mi realme or whatever.....u are really making a bad choice if u go for other brands....because the remate itself is very functional and the display quality is more brighter than other brands
Only problem why people dont consider this is because of warranty issues...but i dont think warranty shall be given such huge importance for an emerging brand...
Very good,
Fully satisfied with this product
Liked it
Picture quality is awesome, if your room doesn't have any natural light, this is tv will work over there very efficiently.

This is one of the best purchases you can make, there may be better offers on other TVs but this is better, all websites list it's processor as Cortex A53, but in reality it is a Cortex A55 which I confirmed using CPU-Z.
